name: Ngc-34-scriptogr.am
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: #ngc-34 This theme is called ngc-34, I built it whilst [learning the basics of Python and Django](http://lowflyingowls.co.uk/post/my-first-week-with-python-django-and-google-app-engine), and have now adapted it in to a scriptogr.am theme.
